scenes.label: *dummy3
texts: Oh? I think I know that graper.
The person who ran down the stairs was the same boy who'd fooled us with a fake fire alert back at Shinjuku Station.
We are police officers! And you are under arrest!
Arrest? I thought you were only supposed to take me into custody?
We might have to take him in if this is another ruse, though.
It's not! We secured the source of the hack, but he's got other insane hackers after him.
That's why I need you to take him in instead of me! The plane's gonna go down if you don't!
A girl and a young man came out of the second-floor apartment. The girl had been wearing a pink costume when we last saw her.
The young man was using AR on his BMI, and there was a cockpit in front of him.
If Pollon Takaoka was lying, he was going overboard with the act.
Was this a trap? Or was it actually...?
So he's the source of the hack?
Let's use his BMI to verify all this, then we can decide whether to take him in or—
We need all the proof we can get! Don't forget that you tricked us last time!
If I let him pull the wool over my eyes again, I'd be unworthy of my badge. I had to be careful with this Takaoka kid.
You're currently with Pollon Takaoka, aren't you?
Y-yes. It turns out that he is the informant.
We're trying to confirm whether or not he's telling the truth.
He might have the key to completing this quest.
You're kidding, right? He's a smalltime criminal. I know the evidence was deleted, but still...
We have no choice but to believe him.
Please don't take your eyes off of him.
Not just anyone can put pressure on the police.
You know, it was a detective that arranged for this.
I'm just a guy who wants to take care of the problem.
That doesn't even come close to answering my question.
And don't go thinking you're innocent just 'cause the evidence is gone!
Let's get this guy into the car.
